mods.abstract: $150 REWARD. THE above reward will be paid by the undersigned for the apprehension and conviction of the person or persons harboring the mulatto girl MATILDA, or TILLA. Said girl is a rather bright mulatto, about 5 feet 7 or 8 inches high, 19 or 20 years of age, stout made, prominent eyes, and short nose turns her feet in when walking, and appears frightened when spoken to roughly. She is no doubt harbored in some of the houses of ill-fame, and I have understood is a frequenter of the colored masked balls. She assumes various disguises and names, and either represents herself to be free or has a forged pass. $75 will be paid for her apprehension alone, and lodging her in any jail of the city.GEO. R. BEARD, Orleans Warehouse, 230 Magazine st. ja27 1m
mods.note: Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )
mods.accessCondition: E-mail lsudiglib@lsu.edu with questions or comments about the collection.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
